name: Glowshelf
description: Bioluminescent bracket fungus forming tiered shelves along damp cavern walls; edges glow with a steady pearl-blue light.

name: Umbercap
description: Thick-stemmed, umber-brown mushroom with a matte, velvety cap and pale gills; often clustered in ringlets.

name: Whispermold
description: Thin gray, felt-like mold that drapes over stone in veils; surface shows fine concentric ripples.

name: Blacklace Moss
description: Delicate moss like dark filigree, weaving lacework patterns over stalagmites; fronds split into intricate nets.

name: Fangsprout
description: Pale sprig studded with toothlike thorns; nodes bead with milky sap that crusts into chalky flecks.

name: Veinbloom
description: Translucent petals veined like marble, each petal faintly luminous; blooms hang in drooping clusters.

name: Shiverstalk
description: Slender porcelain-white toadstool with frost-flecked gills and a glassy, brittle stem.

name: Mycon Lace
description: Fine fungal threads spanning gaps like cobwebs; strands glisten with dew-like droplets.

name: Griefspore
description: Dusky puffballs with a sooty bloom; the slightest touch sends up a thin cloud of gray dust.

name: Stonewort
description: Tiny, gritty herb with pebble-like nodes and stubby leaves rooting in calcified cracks.

name: Ebontruffle
description: Knobbly black truffle with faint metallic sheen; flesh marbled charcoal and slate.

name: Lurkerâ€™s Ivy
description: Colorless vine with translucent, sucker-like pads; trails across ceilings in looping swags.

name: CrystalVine
description: Creeping vine with translucent, shardlike leaves that catch and scatter light.

name: BeechNettle
description: Serrated green leaves beneath beech canopies; stems lined with fine, glassy hairs.

name: DreamThorn
description: Tall, thorny stalks crowned with velvet-purple blossoms; petals curl inward at dusk.

name: SkyVine
description: Silvery-blue vine clinging to crags; leaves are narrow and wind-frayed.

name: StarMist
description: Night-luminous flower with a soft, shimmering haze; stamens sparkle in low light.

name: NightMist
description: Creeping moss with bluish fronds that deepen in color as evening falls.

name: ThunderShroom
description: Stout mushroom with ragged gills splayed like lightning forks; cap pitted and matte.

name: FeyBerries
description: Small berries that glow faintly, shifting through hues beneath shaded boughs.

name: SirenBloom
description: Seafoam-green blossoms with hollow, fluted petals that whistle in strong coastal wind.

name: CinderFlower
description: Charcoal-gray blooms in ashy soil; petals edged with ember-like speckling.

name: VenomMushroom
description: Pale, cream cap dappled with olive spots; a waxy sheen coats the gills.

name: OrchidRoot
description: Gnarled, knuckled root beneath delicate woodland orchids; rings pale and concentric.

name: EmeraldBerries
description: Clusters of glossy emerald-green berries with faceted skins like cut glass.

name: TwilightFern
description: Fern with dusky purple fronds that curl inward at sundown into tight scrolls.

name: SpecterBloom
description: Ghost-white petals on a thin, upright stem; blooms hold a faint, opaline glaze.

name: LightLeaf
description: Bright green leaves laced with faintly glowing veins; edges serrated and soft.

name: PoisonRoot
description: Dark, tarry root that bleeds inky sap when sliced; skin rough and ridged.

name: DuskLeaf
description: Soft, blue-tinged leaves on low steppe shrubs; undersides powdered with silver bloom.

name: MiasmaMoss
description: Thick, olive mat of moss clinging to swamp roots; gives off a pungent, peaty odor.

name: Witchthorn
description: Twisted shrub threaded with long black thorns; berries glow a faint amber at night.

name: GhostLily
description: Moon-pale lily with long, drooping petals; pollen dusts fingertips silver.

name: BloodIvy
description: Crimson ivy that stains skin on contact; leaves shaped like arrowheads.

name: EmberFern
description: Sturdy fronds veined like banked coals; frond tips char at the edges.

name: Moonpetal
description: Silvery-blue blossom that unfurls only under a full moon; petals mirror the night sky.

name: Sunfern
description: Golden fronds that arc toward the sun; stems ridged and sun-warm to the touch.

name: Honeycap
description: Amber-capped mushroom with a slight translucence; gills arranged in tidy, radiating lines.

name: Bitterroot
description: Knotted, ochre root with fibrous rings and a flaky outer skin.

name: Stormmorel
description: Pitted morel with tall honeycomb cap; stems pale and hollow.

name: Blightcap
description: Sooty, brittle mushroom whose cap flakes like charcoal.

name: Seawhip Kelp
description: Long, whiplike fronds with bubble-like floats; fronds tangle into braided ribbons.

name: Glassroot
description: Translucent root with prismatic fibers; segments snap with a clean, glassy break.

name: Frostbeard Lichen
description: Pale, icy lichen that bristles like a frozen beard along high stone faces.

name: Serpent Truffle
description: Green-marbled truffle with sinuous striations; firm, springy flesh.

name: Ashen Puff
description: Round puffball filled with fine ash-gray spores; outer skin thin and papery.

name: Marshsnare Root
description: Fibrous swamp root with long, ribbon-like strands that coil around nearby reeds.

name: Gullscream Fungus
description: White shore fungus with blade-thin caps that vibrate in gusting sea wind.

name: Saffron Bulb
description: Golden bulbs splaying crimson threads from their centers; skins papery and thin.

name: Needlecap
description: Tall, narrow mushroom with a pinched tip and straight, tightly packed gills.

name: Saltshade
description: Shadowy, low succulent dusted with salt; leaves thick, triangular, and mottled.

name: Honey root
